entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `word` TEXT NOT NULL, `word_normalized` TEXT NOT NULL, `language_tag` TEXT NOT NULL, `frequency` INTEGER NOT NULL, `source` TEXT NOT NULL, `character_count` INTEGER NOT NULL, `created_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `last_used` INTEGER NOT NULL)

indices.name: idx_exact_lookup
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_exact_lookup` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`language_tag`, `word_normalized`)

indices.name: idx_frequency_recent
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_frequency_recent` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`language_tag`, `frequency`, `last_used`)

indices.name: idx_cleanup
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_cleanup` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`frequency`, `last_used`)

entities.createSql: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`word` TEXT NOT NULL, `word_normalized` TEXT NOT NULL, content=`learned_words`)
contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_learned_words_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `learned_words` BEGIN DELETE FROM `learned_words_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_learned_words_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `learned_words` BEGIN DELETE FROM `learned_words_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_learned_words_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `learned_words` BEGIN INSERT INTO `learned_words_fts`(`docid`, `word`, `word_normalized`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`word`, NEW.`word_normalized`); END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_learned_words_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `learned_words` BEGIN INSERT INTO `learned_words_fts`(`docid`, `word`, `word_normalized`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`word`, NEW.`word_normalized`); END

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO room_master_table (id,identity_hash) VALUES(42, 'a76c35fd178ef565c07ff8c2f1c8e9fb')
